content: from 2nd st on left needle draw through a loop leave loop on rh needle k3 make 2nd loop into the same st* p2 repeat from * to * p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 *sl the loop p3 slip the loop* k2 repeat from * to * k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 row 3 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 *sl the loop k1 psso k1 k2tog* p2 repeat from * to * p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 4 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 *p3* k2 repeat from * to * k2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 repeat row 1 to 4 until you have knitted 29 row of spikes taking into account each row has 2 spikes therefore you will have 58 spikes in total crochet flowers cast on 10 chains row 1 2 chain 2 single_crochet 2 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 chain 1sc 1sc2tog 1sc 2 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 chain 1sc 2 decrease 1 single_crochet leave a long tail to sew the flower you will roll the flower and work the yarn with your yarn needle backwards and forwards the back of your work to hold it all together then you will sew the flower to your headband you can add as many flowers as you like finishing you will sew the two ends of the headband together with a yarn needle your headband is now finished  enjoy @fiolett patterns knitting pattern any total or parrrtttiiiaaalll rrreeeppprrroooddduuuccctttiiiooonnn ooofff ttthhheee cccooonnnttteeennnttt ooofff ttthhhiiisss pattern is ppprrrooohhhiiibbbiiittteeeddd eeexxxccceeepppttt wwwiiittthhh ttthhheee eeexxxppprrreeessssss cccooonnnssseeennnttt ooofff ttthhheee aaauuuttthhhooorrr yolanda martín alias @@ffiioolleetttt patterns ffoorr aannyy qquueessttiioonnss yyoouu ccaann ccoonnttaacctt hhoollaaffiioolleetttt@@ggmmaaiill ccoomm mmyy ssoocciiaall nneettwwoorrkkss instagram @@ffiioolleetttt patterns
